refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Packerix is a NixOS way to generate terraform json. You can create modules like you would in NixOS.

listitem.para: path to the config.nix. If not given it will use the config.nix in the current folder.

refsection.title: Run Examples
refsection.para: To create a JSON file out of a config.nix run
To create a JSON file out of a file ./path/my-config.nix run
To create a JSON file and run terraform
refsection.programlisting: packerix > config.tf.json && terraform init && terraform apply
